name: OCR
author: TrustyJAID
ow0x
short: Detect text in images using Google Cloud Vision API.
description: Detect text in images using Google Cloud Vision API.
install_msg:
This cog requires an API key for Google Cloud Vision API.
Go to this link to enable the Cloud Vision API:
<https://console.cloud.google.com/flows/enableapi?apiid=vision.googleapis.com>

Once you have enabled this API, go to Credentials section to create an API key:
<https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials>

â„¹ The API key gives you free usage quota of 1000 requests per month. More on pricing here:
https://cloud.google.com/vision/pricing


Once you have the API key, Copy it and set it in your red instance with:
```[p]set api google_vision api_key <copied_api_key>```
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
